config.descript: fall season kicks ass and you can go fuck yourself if you don't like it

items.title: cheese plate
items.descript: cashew and brazil nut, sage cheeses, coconut walnuts, apricot jam, beet and sunflower cake and local bee boy honey.

items.title: apple and fennel salad
items.descript: arsley, celery, green onion, lemon, evoo.

items.title: stuffed mushroom
items.descript: sage, sunflower, carrot, rosemary, orange and lemon.

items.title: curried broccoli
items.descript: flax and beet wrap, ginger, avocado and arugula w/ a cucumber and mint salad.

items.title: kobocha squash pad thai
items.descript: kelp noodles, tamarind, basil, garlic, green onion, carrot, mint and almond.

items.title: nachos
items.descript: flax and sweet potato chips, beet, walnut, avocado, cashew sour cream, red onion, shaved cabbage and red pepper.

items.title: stuffed collard greens
items.descript: portobello, pumpkin seeds, celery, garlic, pickled onions, spicy ginger cream.

items.title: black truffle mac and cheese
items.descript: w/ brown rice pasta, coconut and cashew sauce, broccoli, sun dried tomatoes and spinach.

items.title: peanut butter kale and butter nut squash
items.descript: w/ maple syrup, red onion, garlic, and crushed peanuts.

items.title: mushroom noodle bowl
items.descript: w/ rice vermicelli, miso and mushroom broth, peppers, greens, onion, ginger, garlic, mint and basil.

items.title: pumpkin curry
items.descript: w/ sweet potato, red potato, yellow curry, garlic, onion, chick peas, and coconut milk.

items.title: bbq tofu salad
items.descript: mixed organic greens, carrot, tomato cucumber, kale, chick peas and a roasted tomato dressing.

items.title: huge gardan salad
items.descript: mixed organic greens, carrots, kale, cucumber, tomato, red pepper, and sunflower seeds.

items.title: pumpkin pie
items.descript: almond, date, coconut, vanilla cashew cream.

items.title: apple cheese cake
items.descript: sunflower seed, pumpkin seed, chai tea.

items.title: seasonal granita
items.descript: ask your server for the flavor.
